flawed_nl_solution:
If in eight years Brian will be 40 years old, he is currently 40-8 = <<40-8=32>>32 years old.
Since Christian is twice as old as Brian, he is 2*32 = <<2*32=46>>46 years old.
In 8 years, Christian will be 46+8 = <<46+8=54>>54 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 46. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
